description: Quick easy and tasty for a cheese or grazing platter.
keywords: Cheese,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Brie & Tomato Oil Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 200g cherry or grape tomatoes - quite ripe

recipeInstructions.text: Heat olive oil in small saucepan on med heat.
Cut cherry or grape tomatoes in half and add to oil in saucepan. Season with salt and pepper and thyme (if using).
Bring to light boil then reduce heat and simmer for 10 min or so. Adjust seasonings if needed.Keep warm until ready to serve.
Remove brie from fridge and leave out to soften at room temperature.
When serving, pour tomato and oil over the top of the brie to allow cheese to melt a little in the middle.Serve immediately with wafers or crackers.
